TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InterfaceQueuingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class InterfaceQueuingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class InterfaceQueuingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 啟用標記介面的佇列支援。

span.span: Enables queuing support for the marked interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此介面上的呼叫會使用訊息佇列會排入佇列。Calls on this interface will be queued using Message Queuing. 若要標示的介面，為已排入佇列，請將此屬性套用至介面，使用下列語法： `[InterfaceQueuing]`。To mark an interface as queued, apply this attribute to the interface using the following syntax: `[InterfaceQueuing]`. 已排入佇列的介面的成員方法必須滿足的需求已排入佇列的方法呼叫，例如有無`out`或`ref`參數。The member methods of a queued interface must fulfill the requirements for queued method calls, such as having no `out` or `ref` parameters. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`InterfaceQueuingAttribute`屬性。The following code example shows how to use the `InterfaceQueuingAttribute` attribute. [!code-cpp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CPP/queuedcomponent.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CS/queuedcomponent.cs#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用佇列在編譯時間標示的 COM + 應用程式`ApplicationQueuing`屬性，然後藉由設定啟用 COM + 接聽程式`QueueListenerEnabled`設為 trueThe following code example shows how to mark a COM+ application as queued at compile time by using the `ApplicationQueuing` attribute, and enable the COM+ listener by setting the `QueueListenerEnabled` to true [!code-cpp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CPP/queuedcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CS/queuedcomponent.cs#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`BindToMoniker`執行已排入佇列的 moniker，來取得執行個體的錄製器，呼叫的方法，將記錄，並強制執行錄製器物件，來傳送訊息至佇列的版本。The following code example shows how to use `BindToMoniker` to run the queued moniker, to get an instance of the recorder, call the method that will be recorded, and force the release of the recorder object, to send the message to the queue. [!code-cpp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CPP/queuedcomponentclientclass.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CS/queuedcomponentclientclass.cs#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至`Queuing-Enabled`COM + 中的屬性。This property corresponds to the `Queuing-Enabled` property in COM+.
